entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
